p:
The propolis by-product extract, which was combined with pectin to obtain spray-dried microparticles, including the dipeptide
l -alanyl-
l -glutamine as promoting systems of neutrophils, was described. The thermal constancy of the formulation was determined, and pectin,
l -alanyl-
l -glutamine, and propolis by-product extracts were spread over the matrix. The microparticles released the drug in vitro for 24 h, which was regulated by swelling and diffusion. The drug-loaded compositions demonstrated a valuable stimulating impact on neutrophils. These structures could strengthen the activity of the immune cells [ 129].
